channel.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 == TOPIC CLOSED FOR COUNTING NOMINATIONS
channel.description:
Hey everyone! With the year coming to a close and so many amazingly talented Auxy producers both new and old showing their skills in the production scene, it's about that time where we vote on our favorite artists and songs in the 2018 Auxy Forum Awards. Courtesy of our friendly neighborhood janitor @MisterMaster, I'll be your host for this year's awards. [spoiler](Bribing him was a lot cheaper than I originally expected. :sunglasses: )[/spoiler] So without further ado...
**How does it work?**
* Each person will nominate their favorite producer per category between now and **December 29th, 2018** * The top 10 entries in each category will be placed in polls to be voted on until **January 5th, 2019**
**Guidelines:**
> 1. Each person is allowed one post in the nominations thread. > 2. Only nomination posts will be allowed (off topic posts will be removed). > 3. All nominations must use the nomination form below to make counting votes easier. > 4. Only one nomination per category. > 5. You can change your nominations by editing your post, but on 29 Dec, the nomination thread will be locked for counting. > 6. You can nominate yourself if you want... don't worry, we won't judge. ;) > 7. Nominated tracks should be created completely in Auxy.* > 8. You can nominate remixes, but mention the name of the original artist too.
\* Outside samples are allowed--the track just has to be 100% constructed and staged in the Auxy app.
**Prize:** Winners will receive a :unicorn: as a title by their forum name.
**Nomination Form:** Copy and paste this text into this nomination thread.
> NOMINATIONS: > **1. Favorite Auxy Track of 2018** (specify TRACK_NAME + PRODUCER NAME) > **2. Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018** (specify PRODUCER NAME) > **3. Most innovative Track of 2018** (specify TRACK_NAME + PRODUCER NAME) > **4. Most unique Auxy Producer of 2018** (specify PRODUCER NAME) > **5. One forum member who has been especially supportive of your music?**
How many winners will be eligible for such a prize, you might ask? Well...
* Favorite Tracks = top 3 get unicorn. * Favorite Producer = top 3 get unicorn. * Most innovative Track = Winner gets unicorn. * Most unique Producer = Winner gets unicorn. * Most supportive forum member = top 3 get unicorn.
See you all on the 29th... and happy nominating. :fist:

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 == TOPIC CLOSED FOR COUNTING NOMINATIONS
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
NOMINATIONS:
1. Favorite Auxy Track of 2018 Gday by @Southborne
2. Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018 SynthwaveGoose
3. Most innovative Track of 2018 Viiper by @Notmiles
4. Most unique Auxy Producer of 2018 @xavior
5. One forum member who has been especially supportive of your music? @Arimyth (for his community efforts).

OMG. Can’t believe I didn’t add @anon38751485 in there!
And many thanks to @iammane for his mod work.

Read full topic

3. Most innovative Track of 2018 Anti-Edo - @Thrashie

I’m looking forward to 2019. You guys all do great work, but how X-[K] / K-ro / Thrashie completely abuses this app is awe inspiring. Every track is just… ridiculous.

item.dc:creator: joshuatuworldwide
item.description:
NOMINATIONS:
1. Favorite Auxy Track of 2018: @anon38751485 - 198X
2. Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018: @Thrashie
3. Most innovative Track of 2018: @anon42661524, @Xicon,
@Matik, Vectr, Kerfuffle, @Thrashie, @Aqzi, @Cornea & @Xiejra - Anarchy
4. Most unique Auxy Producer of 2018: @Cornea

typical shoutouts:

  1. massive props for Sei, @Thrashie and @Matik for helping running the vvvvv label
  2. shoutout to @Arimyth and @Hum4n01d for support my tracks whether it’s Auxy or not and also running the Auxy Collective successfully
  3. lastly, thank you to everyone here on Auxy for making this app and this forum possible and overall fun to chat with people with here

item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Favorite Auxy Track of 2018: Anti-Edo by @Thrashie
Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018: @Thrashie

@Thrashie was a clear standout for me in 2018.

Shout outs to both @xavior and @joshuatuworldwide who round out my podium.
Both had stellar years and put out my favourite Auxy albums of 2018.

And finally, a huge thanks to @MisterMaster, @iammane and @Arimyth for the wonderful work they do for the community.

Also Thanks to @stereofield, and @anon73773654 for the Label Partnership over the past year almost. Hope to have things lined up to bring us closer together as partners and friends, Cheers!

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 == TOPIC CLOSED FOR COUNTING NOMINATIONS
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
It’s kind of unreal how much amazing new music I’ve seen pop up in the last year. And all made with an iphone app. Honestly unbelievable. I threw in a couple honorable mentions to highlight a couple people from other categories that we don’t have in the forum awards but still deserve recognition IMO.

NOMINATIONS:
1. Favorite Auxy Track of 2018 (Fade by @stereofield)
2. Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018 (@Fokkses)
3. Most innovative Track of 2018 (Recapitulate by @Xiejra)
4. Most unique Auxy Producer of 2018 (@NotMiles)
5. One forum member who has been especially supportive of your music? @MrSerpent

HONORABLE MENTIONS:

@Vokon for bringing some smooth compositions at such a young age, @stereofield and @Thrashie for their respective label initiatives, @tnyari as (one of) the most underrated Auxy artist(s) of 2018, and @DJ_La_Rocca for his incredible Auxy tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: == Auxy Forum Awards 2018 == TOPIC CLOSED FOR COUNTING NOMINATIONS
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
NOMINATIONS:
1. Favorite Auxy Track of 2018 Anti-Edo by @Thrashie
2. Favorite Auxy Producer of 2018 @xavior
3. Most innovative Track of 2018
Apart For Now by @Cornea
4. Most unique Auxy Producer of 2018 @Thrashie
5. One forum member who has been especially supportive of your music? @anon86704580

HONOURABLE MENTIONS

Also would just want to thank @xavior for being a massive influence to my music, its been such an amzing year, and workinf with you pretty much topped it off. @HELIXX who was here when I first started producing, and played out our track at his school which is pretty dope
@DJ_La_Rocca for just being a genral mate outside of music producing and being there for me when times were tough. Much love you guys

~X
